blocks.title: CALIcon 2018
blocks.description: Justia sponsored and attended CALIcon18, held at American University Washington College of Law in Washington, DC. The conference brought together leading academics, educators, institutional leaders, and technology professionals to discuss the transformation of legal education through technology and innovation.

blocks.title: SMX Advanced
blocks.description: Samantha, Jessica, Rene & Gus attended the SMX Advanced conference in Seattle this June, where the latest tips and best practices for search marketing & SEO are covered.
